typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	blobPath as string,
	blobName as string,
	containerName as string
}
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Plant as string,
		AverageTemperature as integer,
		AverageHumidity as integer,
		TemperatureDescription as string,
		ProcessedTime as timestamp,
		PlantType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(PlantType == "Government" || PlantType == "Private") ~> Filter1
